My Zora take collection 

https://s.craft.me/brqgmS0CuQ3nls

Thinking on coining content with nouns and other community alignment with Claude 

https://claude.ai/share/d72d9237-4ea6-4348-82ff-e3dbf5fa8788

New Zora launch has us on an old contracts with broken minting since we implemented based on the frames v1 endpoint they aren’t putting back up.

Spoke with the Zora team and did a bunch of research and thinking on the new approach.

Ultimately I think I want to make it easy to mint casts with % going back to the Nouns treasury. I think people will be willing to give a portion of their secondary if it pops off to public goods/Nouns.

I think the new approach vs staying on the old contracts is the best way to do that for distribution and secondary market efficiency reasons.

But the Zora SDK won’t be updated until next week so plan is to implement it when it comes out and hard launch on DUNA day March 12 with a way for people to cast and contribute to Nouns and lining up some awesome Nounish mints with splits.
